Messages.Author: Silvia Westerwick
Messages.Content: Über MeWI Organisation auf ISIS können Sie sich für eine Sprechstunde morgen vormittag eintragen :)

Messages.Author: Silvia Westerwick
Messages.Content: Dear colloquium team, Tomorrow, we will hear from three presenters who are eager to get your input in response to their research ideas and plans. I look forward to our joint discussion! Also, I will briefly share plans for continued support throughout summer break, see preview here. Lastly, if you are interested to view the feedback (start/stop/continue) last week, you can access it here. See you tomorrow! SW

Messages.Author: Silvia Westerwick
Messages.Content: Dear colloquium research  team :)  In our session tomorrow, I will discuss planning thesis steps approaches to self-management working towards WS 24/25 as needed: finding/defining research topic, reviewing the suggested topics on  link

Discussions.Discussion_Name: House-keeping colloquium :) Please bring your favorite article

Messages.Author: Silvia Westerwick
Messages.Content: Dear students, I am planning to discuss approaches to structuring content in a master's thesis with you today. For this purpose, I would like you to pull up a review article (or alternatively, a research article) that you like and/or that is in your area of interest. PLEASE DO THIS BEFORE OUR SESSION TODAY.  In other house-keeping items: ****only two more open sessions that you could utilize to present / discuss topics, projects, etc. *** 1) The TU published a new document for the 'Eigenständigkeitserklärung' which we will briefly review. 2) Check-in regarding individual topic interests / progress with thesis 3) If time permits, review writing examples together -- if you have any draft chapter or text material, I'd be delighted if we can utilize it to review together. See you later! Cheers, SW

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Kolloquium heute, 16 Uhr: 'Musik & Soziale Identität' Projekt Ying Teng

Messages.Author: Silvia Westerwick
Messages.Content: Happy Monday, liebe Kolloquiumsteilnehmer/innen friendly reminder: Wir starten um Punkt 16:00 Uhr Heute stellt Ying Teng ihr Projekt vor und hofft auf Ihr Feedback. Wenn die Zeit es erlaubt, besprechen wir Sarah Gutzeits Einleitungskapitel sowie Anna Severs Erfahrungen mit der Experiment-Erstellung (Experiment ist nun 'live'!) Bis später :) SW

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Research Colloquium Cancelled -- zoom meetings available for questions

Messages.Author: Silvia Westerwick
Messages.Content: Dear colloquium participants, Ying Teng is calling in sick this morning and cannot present, so I must cancel today's meeting.  I am availble to answer questions via zoom meeting (I plan to start with feedback for Anna 16:00-16:15 -- Anna please confirm that will work). If you want to meet, please send an email. https://tu-berlin.zoom.us/my/silvia.westerwick?pwd=ZDdqUEg1ZmgyNHJGVVk2aUFpUGgyQT09 Have a sunny day. SW

Messages.Author: Silvia Westerwick
Messages.Content: This coming Monday: double-session (replaces last session of semester) 14:15 - 15:45 at HBS 010 -- Guest Speaker Dr. Ohme, Weizenbaum Institute 16:00 - 17:30 regular room: Project presentation Sarah Gutzeit, Update on your Scopus Lit Searches, if time permits Anna Sever Project update

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Friendly reminder that we start at 4 pm SHARP!

Messages.Author: Silvia Westerwick
Messages.Content: Please arrive punctually at 16:00 military time :) (as we start SINE tempore)

Messages.Author: Silvia Westerwick
Messages.Content: Dear students:  Hopefully you had a lovely Pfingsten weekend and are enjoying a sunny Sunday. Here a friendly reminder that we will talk through literature review writing tomorrow, upon student request. Vanesa Yepes will be a our 'special guest' to discuss the topic "Scopus review". I am in the process of compiling some materials, so if you have any special questions or concerns, shoot me an email :) Attached image features as cheat sheet for academic phrasing of content, for starters.  The session tomorrow will look also look at 'big picture' topics such as strategic steps for writing, structure, self-organization.  See you tomorrow, SW

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Guest Speaker Leonie Wunderlich, Hans-Bredow-Institut: "Use the News" Initiative

Messages.Author: Silvia Westerwick
Messages.Content: Dear course participants: Friendly Reminder: Our session this Monday starts at 14:00 **sharp** with our guest speaker Leonie Wunderlich from Hans-Bredow-Institute. See link to attend below:   Guest Speaker: Leonie Wunderlich - News Consumption Trends in Germany   Time May 13, 2024 02:00 PM Meeting ID 696 1081 8565   Passcode028329 Invite Link zoom link https://tu-berlin.zoom.us/j/69610818565?pwd=Yy91OGxWazNOUE1KVWN5TmtnSEc4Zz09

Discussions.Discussion_Name: For All Colloquium Participants: I need your help :)
